channel.title: CMEcorner2go: Asthma and COPD
channel.itunes:author: CMEcorner.com
channel.itunes:summary: Welcome to cmecorner2go, an educational service of CME Corner (cmecorner.com). Earn CME (continuing medical education) credit by participating in this FREE audio podcast on the Management Strategies of Asthma and COPD (chronic obstructive pulmonary disease). This program provides continuing education credit for physicians, physician assistants (PA), nurses, and nurse practitioners (NP). CME Corner is dedicated to providing quality medical education for health care professionals. To view our full selection of CME and CE programs and podcasts, please visit us online at www.cmecorner.com.

item.title: MP3: Asthma and COPD: Management Strategies for the Primary Care Provider
item.itunes:author: cmecorner.com
item.description: This CME/CE activity is provided free of charge. Play this MP3 file in your selected Media Player. Please view the accompanying PDF workbook for credit details.
item.itunes:keywords: CME, continuing medical education, medical education, asthma, COPD, chronic obstructive pulmonary disease, lung disease, PFT, smoking, inhaler, medicine, nursing, pharmacist, nurse practitioner, physician, physician assistant, pharmacy, primary care

item.title: PDF: Asthma and COPD: Management Strategies for the Primary Care Provider
item.itunes:author: cmecorner.com
item.description: This is the PDF workbook. Click on the link and it should open in your browser with Adobe Acrobat Reader. Complete and print the test for continuing education credit.
